hero.hello: The best and most effective facial correction techniques from a trainer
hero.name: Online course in contouring

about.title: About me
about.text1: Elizaveta Rusakova Dermatovenereologist, cosmetologist, owner of a popular clinic in the city of Dnipro. Elizaveta has passed more than 30 advanced trainings, not only from Ukrainian specialists, but also from the European
about.text3: In this course, Elizaveta has invested the basic and individual developments of her work. The course was created for cosmetologists to share information and experience, for specialists who cannot attend training in person. The courses are introductory in nature with the technique of a cosmetologist.

course_1.title: Facial contouring course
course_1.text: Theoretical part, analysis of preparations, review of needles, insertion techniques, analysis of correction methods, demonstration on models.

course_2.title: Flat bow technique course
course_2.text: Theoretical part, disassembly of drugs, injection techniques, schematic demonstration, demonstration on models.

course_3.title: Botulinum therapy course
course_3.text: Theoretical part, dosage calculation, counting the number of units, injection anatomy for botulinum toxin, demonstration on models.

course_4.title: Course of biorevitalization, lipolytics, scalp mesotherapy
course_4.text: Theoretical part, analysis of drugs, subject of choice for the patient, mechanism of action, demonstration on the model.
